page.title: 07Pembrey Country Park
page.content: Close by our village is the{Pembrey {Country Park.}It opened officially on} July 31st, 1980. The Park is approximately 6,000 acres of forestry, beach, sand dunes, grassland and salt marsh. It is a beautiful place where people come for peace, enjoyment and relaxation. About 350,000 visitors a year come to the Park - some from as far away as Brazil, but most people come from Llanelli and Swansea. There are many interesting pursuits for visitors-a small railway track, an adventure playground,a trim track,pony trekking, nature trails, orienteering, camping, exibitions and the beautiful beach and forest. Many animals can be seen rabbits, hares, foxes, squirrels and numbers of different birds. It is very difficult to imagine now that for many years this lovely area was used as a Royal Ordnance Factory.
